subsection.name: Set admin mode to false
subsection.p: You must set the value of /server/admin to false

subsection.name: Unsecure the content
subsection.p:
You must set the value of /server/secureURIList/0001/URI to /.magnolia/*
Afterwards only the AdminCentral is secured. One can secure content again with adding other URLS to the config.

subsection.name: Activate cache
subsection.p: You must set the value of /server/cache/level1/active to true
